summary: Refactored navigation animations with centralized timing constants and fixed SSR deployment error
Created /create-blog-post slash command for automated blog post creation
Built complete blog system with markdown, syntax highlighting, and SEO
Created /dev-diary and /quick-commit slash commands for workflow automation
Fixed Resume details panel text overflow on mobile
Added fade-in animations to project detail pages
Fixed Notes table horizontal scroll on mobile
Fixed Resume section UX bugs and made timeline future-proof
Created /log-work slash command with checkpoint logic for multiple logs per session
Set up local Stable Diffusion with M3 GPU support and CLI generator
Built interactive Notes table with filtering, sorting, pagination and project detail pages
Created /create-project slash command for cross-directory project automation
Fixed animation timing inconsistencies across all navigation paths
Improved back transition animations and eliminated nav button flicker
Fixed 404 errors with hybrid navigation system preserving animations and SEO
Improved Resume mobile experience with reduced spacing and maroon education bars
Fixed layout shifting bug in Resume timeline and added mobile optimizations with horizontal scroll
Polished Resume section with clickable company links and updated all job descriptions
Built interactive Gantt timeline for Resume section with collision detection algorithm
Fixed header flicker during back transitions using CSS visibility property
Implemented smooth section transitions with layoutId morphing animations
Fixed entrance animation timing and TypeScript build errors in view components
Deployed site to production with custom domain alansee.dev and set up Google Search Console
Added Vercel Analytics and comprehensive SEO metadata with Person schema markup
Created cinematic entrance animation with loading dots, key press effect, and confetti particles
